headline: Maryland American Water Files Rate Request Driven by $22 Million of Investment Over Last Seven Years
summary: BEL AIR, Md., August 01, 2025--Maryland American Water filed a request today with the Maryland Public Service Commission (PSC) for new rates, reflecting $22 million of water system investments since the company’s last rate request. The request reinforces the company’s commitment to replacing aging infrastructure and continuing to provide high-quality water service in compliance with environmental regulations for the benefit of customers.

headline: Essential Utilities Q2 Earnings & Revenues Beat Estimates, Up Y/Y
summary: WTRG posts strong second-quarter results with earnings and revenues increasing 37.5% and 18.7%, respectively, fueled by rate hikes and segment strength.
